abstract: An investor aiming for the top, again. | Hess and hedge fund end proxy fight in compromise. | Big banks get break in rules limiting risks. | Shareholders denied access to Chase vote results. | Jesse Eisinger on why fund managers may be right on the Fed.

headline.main: Week in Review: How to Lose an Activist Investor in 10 Days
